FuncDef: This command configures the L2TP tunnel group. The tunnel-group-name is configured in theconfig>router>l2tpcontext. Refer to the7450 ESS, 7750 SR, 7950 XRS, and VSR Router Configuration Guide.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing tunnel L2TP group, up to 63 characters.
Specifies an existing service ID or service name. Values-service-id: 1 to 214748364.
